import React, {useState,useEffect} from 'react' const ProductView = () => { const [ProductData, setProductData] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { fetch('http://localhost:3001/api/getproduct') .then(response => response.json()) .then(data => setProductData(data)) .catch(error => console.error('Error fetching product data:', error)); }, []); return (

Products

{ProductData.map((product, index) => ( ))}
Product Name Category Quantity Unit of Measurement Price Stock Image Description
{product.product_name} {product.category_name} {product.qty} {product.uom} {product.price} {product.stock} {product.description}
) } export default ProductView
